# Publishers.TimeGroupingStrategy.byTime(_:_:)

**Case**

A grouping that collects and periodically publishes items.

## Declaration

```swift
case byTime(Context, Context.SchedulerTimeType.Stride)
```

## Time groupings

- **Publishers.TimeGroupingStrategy.byTimeOrCount(_:_:_:)**: A grouping that collects and publishes items periodically or when a buffer reaches a maximum size.

items.description: A grouping that collects and publishes items periodically or when a buffer reaches a maximum size.
items.name: Publishers.TimeGroupingStrategy.byTimeOrCount(_:_:_:)
